name: Gluwa, Inc.
description: Gluwa is a builder of Gluwa, Creditcoin, and a stealth protocol. Gluwa connects DeFi investors to TradFi investment opportunities. Creditcoin is an interoperable credit network that powers Gluwa. The stealth protocol provides trustless proof-of-location, which enhances the security and usability of Gluwa.
one_liner: Gluwa is a builder of Gluwa, Creditcoin, and a stealth protocol. Gluwa connects DeFi investors to TradFi investment opportunities. Creditcoin is an interoperable credit network that powers Gluwa. The stealth protocol provides trustless proof-of-location, which enhances the security and usability of Gluwa.
